#Deployment of USCM forces - USCM should be following their role objectives. - Medics should heal their comrades, a specialist should be using their equipment. - Squad leaders should always listen to command. - Squad members should always follow the orders of the squad leader. - Department heads (RD, CMP, CMO) should not deploy. - All marines should deploy when possible.
##Ship crew may deploy, where relevant. - Maint techs may assist building FOB. - The CMO may give permission to doctors so they may treat marines within the FOB. - The CMP may give permission to MP so they may make arrests within the FOB. - Combat Correspondents focus on reporting on combat and disengage when attacked. - CO, XO may deploy if they assign a new warship commander (The person in charge of the warship crew)
